response.original_title: The Beatles’ “Sgt. Pepper’s Lonely Hearts Club Band” DTS-HD MA
response.overview: Immerse yourself in the groundbreaking sound of The Beatles’ eighth studio album, “Sgt. Pepper’s Lonely Hearts Club Band,” now available in DTS-HD Master Audio 7.1 Surround mix on Blu-ray. Released in 1967, this album is celebrated for its innovative studio techniques, eclectic musical styles, and its role in defining the psychedelic era. Featuring iconic tracks like “Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds,” “A Day in the Life,” and “With a Little Help from My Friends,” this album showcases The Beatles at their creative peak.  With DTS-HD MA Surround, every layer of sound is delivered with stunning clarity and depth, enveloping you in a rich, multi-dimensional audio experience. The high-definition audio format preserves the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques, offering an unparalleled listening experience for audiophiles and Beatles fans alike.
response.title: The Beatles’ “Sgt. Pepper’s Lonely Hearts Club Band” DTS-HD MA
